Introduction

CHI CHI (Short for Creative Electronic House Idols) was a South Korean female group formed by Trophy Entertainment in 2011. CHI CHI debuted on March 18 with the digital single Don't Play Around. In October 2013, it was announced that the group officially disbanded.
